website_summaries.verdict: A portable alternative to a standard medicine cabinet. Ideal for camping trips or on-the-go use.
pros: Spacious enough to hold 20-24 mini prescription bottles
Features a combination locking mechanism for added safety if minors are present
Very lightweight but highly durable design
cons: Some users find the recessed combination lock fiddly to operate

customer_reviews.title: Impressed! Easy to Change Code! Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed to say the least! The Medicine lock box came the very next, which wasn’t expected. Now myself and my family take meds daily, I personally take 12 every morning and 6 every night. Some Narcotics for chronic pain and autoimmune diseases. That being said, my son is getting to age of possibly picking the wrong friends. Those friends may ask my sweet, kind son, if his parents have any meds (drugs) they can take in secret. It was easy to change the code & holds All my prescription meds.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin Riccardo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and resent the code. The box wouldn't open. I followed the directions on the Youtube video (provided by seller on the amazon site. It required me to pop the back of the box. Of course, the flimsy plastic was damaged when I did this. The entire top of the box completely popped off! Clearly a lock is not sufficient for this box. Terrible product! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: P. DiPadova

customer_reviews.title: It won't unlock and that's the purpose of a lock box grrrr
customer_reviews.text: It was beautiful. I followed instructions to change lock combo and did it slowly. Then it locked and would not unlock. I tried every which way to trick it and it would not unlock. So I pride the white part off to open it and it still will not unlock. Beautiful and well built lockbox but check to make sure your locks work. Returning and not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Denisha S Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not insulated, only fits 1 or 2 medicine trays, small dial to turn for combination
customer_reviews.text: I use it to lock medicines from children. A little smaller than I expected. Plastic is thin, not insulated. Not good for leaving medicine in a heated car. Organized with fixed slots limiting space utilization. Can fit lots of medicine bottles with only space to fit 1 or 2 medicine trays on top. Combination lock is a little small and can be a little hard to turn the number dials and I have regular sized fingers.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not a Smart Box at all
customer_reviews.text: It never latches unless you put your code to lock it. If you miss putting code and hold it by handle then the box cover will open and all the stuffs will be on floor. Really a bad idea to buy this box.
customer_reviews.author: Tanu Shree

customer_reviews.title: Better for Kids
customer_reviews.text: The lock combination section is a joke. We are regular, fit, adults and the area where you scroll your code in is made for a 1st grader’s fingers. It’s beyond annoying to place your code in place. Whoever designed this must have been a child. Make the number/combo section bigger for regular fingers and then it will be a much more decent product. We are giving it to our kids for a treasure box.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Morales

customer_reviews.title: Medication is securely out of dementia patient's reach.
customer_reviews.text: My octogenarian mother has dementia. I needed a storage container to secure her oral medications. This combination storage container meets my needs. The medication is stored out of my mother's reach. Be aware, it is plastic and if dropped will likely shatter. If the materials were more substantial, I would have rated this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little box and the lock works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little box and the lock works perfectly. It is a little on the flimsy side- if one wanted to break it open it would not be too difficult, the plastic is fairly thin and I'm sure that if it was dropped on a hard surface floor it would probably crack. Other than that, it's a nice box and should serve it's purpose well. If you have children, I'd keep it up out of reach because if it get dropped, it's probably going to break.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eisenhower

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I set the combination and it did not work. Thankfully I was able to return it
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy plastic and cheap lock
customer_reviews.text: It's a very flimsy thin plastic case. It also has an incredibly cheap lock on it. It's too expensive for 28.99
customer_reviews.author: dahlia_black88

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good and is Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I like this box. I would like to see them make a little larger, as some of my meds come in flat boxes and were difficult to fit in with other meds. I get 90 day prescriptions and wanted a box to hold everything. Recommend this to anyone looking for the same purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! The instructions are in Chinese and poorly written ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The instructions are in Chinese and poorly written in English. I could not figure out how to work this. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use combination lock
customer_reviews.text: I really like this secure box for keeping my meds out of the wrong hands. Its durable and seems really use to use the combination. IRS really hard plastic so you wouldn't be able to break it open unless you used a sledge hammer or something really strong to break the hard plastic. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Easily picked/opened without combination
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put my prescription pills in and keep them locked up. My roommate was able to get it open and close it back up without me even knowing. They did not have the combination. This is not a good product if you really want to keep your items secure. Maybe if you're trying to keep things away from a younger child it would work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! It feels light but is holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! It feels light but is holding up well. I live in a place with 4 kids under five and it is essential that medications be locked up. This is the best option I found and the combination lock is working wonderfully. Even if they pull it down from way high up they can't get into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not secure at all
customer_reviews.text: Cute little box but it’s flimpy plastic. If you were trying to lock pills or cash away in here from another adult they’d get in it with a screw driver in 30 seconds. Or slam it on the ground. Not good for a lock box for any sort of real security but would work ok if you’re locking up stuff from children?
customer_reviews.author: Jessi420

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly thin and definitely not high security, but it does the job to discourage anyone from trying to take something they're not supposed to take and also serves as a great place to keep our meds, whether at home or traveling. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M in SC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a second one because I forgot the combination of the first one. I really like this. However, when I bought the first one, it came with white gloves. The second one did not. Luckily I saved the gloves of the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and storage space.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these medicine lockboxes because I have a toddler. This box is up high out of reach of my toddler. I like the peace of mind knowing that there is another level of security over our medicine and vitamins. The boxes are decent sized and can store a wide range of different size bottles. These boxes certainly won't keep out an adult that is determined, but it will stop a curious toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thorson

customer_reviews.title: OK in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Not that thrilled with this security box (the color is regrettable, but the pink, ordered at first, was worse). Dial difficult to turn. Does hold plenty. We use it as a backup box for less dangerous/serious things.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ives

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not sure of the durability. If you used a hammer, you could definitely get it open pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight but it’s not very durable. Incidental drop popped it open.
customer_reviews.author: Giantniners80

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something in addition to our cabinet locks to keep my toddler out of any medication. I was able to fit a ton in the lock box and despite being lightweight the lock is pretty sturdy. I wouldn't recommend this for someone with older children as I'm sure a determined kiddo will find their way into this box. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Janele Riggs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to break into. Defeats the purpose of having it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sestito

customer_reviews.title: Not hammer proof.
customer_reviews.text: If anyone really wanted to get into this box all they would need is a hammer. It does give security to regular access. Nice size. Not waterproof, fireproof or hammer proof, but definitely kid proof. Will do for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Muncy

customer_reviews.title: It is just too small. I did not realize ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just too small. I did not realize that. So I you have a lot of meds to hide this wont do it.At least I was able to use it and the box it came in to get the meds out of the hall closet.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: This is just plastic that can be cracked open rather easily even when locked
customer_reviews.text: This will (hopefully) keep my toddler out of my meds, but if you have a teen or adult that you're worried about, you'll need something more durable. This is just plastic that can be cracked open rather easily even when locked. Otherwise, it's got a lot of room inside.
customer_reviews.author: K. Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep kids away
customer_reviews.text: Great to keep little ones from getting into meds or other products. Adults could easily pop open
customer_reviews.author: Mh

customer_reviews.title: My husband discreetly watched me and figured out the code
customer_reviews.text: Now I have to order a new one as my meds have been stolen for the 4th time.
customer_reviews.author: yardohkelly

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I dislike these 2 boxes. They are very fragile and locking mechanism to set code cut my hand. It was very very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this loving medicine box! I use it to organize all of mine and my kids medicines. Keeps everything in one place and keeps the honest folks from getting into our medicines. Case can be broken if not taken care of but has been excellent for my purposes and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lyric portwood

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep out of the reach of children.
customer_reviews.text: It's good to keep out of the reach of children. But anyone could break into it. It's plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Locked out after 2 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere does it say to move the numbers with the box open. I was just fiddling with it and moving numbers, now It wont open ! The instruction booklet is not in english. Great, just great. It's a cruddy plastic too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: The handle for the safe box it’s not very sturdy ....
customer_reviews.text: Handle is not as sturdy. My handle for my safe box Is broken. This box was not a good quality for a safe.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Kid proof
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep my "busy bees" out of my medicines and vitamins. Combination set up was so easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: It's made from thin plastic, so don't expect it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's made from thin plastic, so don't expect it to keep an addict out, but it will stop small children. The lock is difficult to use if you have arthritis or trouble with tiny detailed items.
customer_reviews.author: Candace L. Okeson

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: The lock will keep out small children. Overall, it worked for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was for Meds protection. Just didn't fit our thoughts.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what we had anticipated for meds storage. Turned out to be nothing more than a storage box w/ combination lock. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 66$$332233 Stan Tresslar

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it—-not secure or sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The (2) latches in the back broke within 4 months. I used it everyday so it is not sturdy enough to handle a lot of use. I would like a refund but ironically there is no option to return this item. Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: jkennington1966

customer_reviews.title: cheap hard plastic. would crack if accidentally hit the ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap hard plastic. would crack if accidentally hit the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Miramoja

customer_reviews.title: Small box
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought but it will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline B.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but works
customer_reviews.text: This is thinner and lighter weight than what I was expecting. I wanted the combination lock so I don't risk losing the key. Works for what we need. Just a secure spot for medications. Won't use it for travel as I would be afraid it will crack if accidentally dropped.
customer_reviews.author: ngambill

customer_reviews.title: Returning... very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product. If you’re trying to keep children or others out of the box, this isn’t your best option. I’m sure my kid could break it open pretty easily!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and great size!
customer_reviews.text: Love the locking mechanism, love the size and compartments. Perfect for all sorts of private things.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Steinbacher

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It serves its function. It doesn't seem very sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: JFozz

customer_reviews.title: My partner & I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use, & you can change the passcode. There's lots of space to store various things
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lock box. I use it to lock up our medicines. It is a good size. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, instructions are clear on how to set combination
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Martz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps toddler out
customer_reviews.text: My toddler kept getting into my bedside table and taking everything out so I bought this box to keep everything I needed close by away from her destruction. It keeps her out, but a determined adult could 100% get in
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep my meds put away from the kids
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected...it holds my medicine plus much more room for other things that need to be put up from the children. Like always fast delivery from Amazon! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: Love the size! Have a special needs child that gets into everything. He cannot get this open. I use this to keep his medications out of his access. Where others have failed, this one is doing what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Not as secure, combo lock not great
customer_reviews.text: Good buy but not very secure, and combination lock not very easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: Darci E

customer_reviews.title: Good size, sturdiness and value
customer_reviews.text: As described. Perfect for secure med storage in the refrigerator

customer_reviews.title: but so far has held up well and is perfect for our
customer_reviews.text: The plastic body feels a bit cheap, but so far has held up well and is perfect for our use
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The combination lock is easy to set up, but the quality of the product itself is cheap like. I’m not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great For Safely Storing Medications
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to keep her prescription medications. It keeps them safely secure and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: great game stell needs some work

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things fairly secure
customer_reviews.text: Lock prevents intrusive access. You can not lift box by handle without locking it first, good feature. I’m going to get another one.

customer_reviews.title: great for medicine
customer_reviews.text: light weight and easy to care just have hope the lock part is ok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.author: this game is very fun

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for locking my meds and keeping them away from my grandbabies.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set lock
customer_reviews.text: Works well for our need. The dials on the lock are a little sticky but they loosened with use.

customer_reviews.title: Secure place for Medicines
customer_reviews.text: It has lock and combination but the product is very delicate and might break easily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program lock
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to. Easy to program lock. Very durable and can fit a lot of medication bottles. Absolutely no issues whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Lockbox for household
customer_reviews.text: It is a shiny plastic, easily broken. For what I want it for it is great! I am very satisfied! Lock works well. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and SO many uses!!
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected! Perfect for locking medications up away from kids. An added use that we unexpectedly discovered: locking kids' electronic devices up. Perfect!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The english directions are so small it is hard to read them
customer_reviews.author: this game is the best

customer_reviews.title: It makes a cute treasure box too!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this not for a medicine storage, but for our granddaughter to just keep her treasures in. It is perfect for her and really cute. She loves it and it looks great on her dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: LID DOESN'T LOCK VERY GOOD. WHERE IT ATTACES IT NEEDS MORE HOLDING POWER ...
customer_reviews.text: LID DOESN'T LOCK VERY GOOD. WHERE IT ATTACES IT NEEDS MORE HOLDING POWER ON THE HINGES. I AM READY TO GLUE IT OR ADD ANOTHER SCREW. COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER DESIGNED. THANK YOU

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to access
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mother. She absolutely loves it and is very easy for her to use. She is in her 70’s so having something easy for her to use is a plus. Great product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Keeps the meds locked away from little hands.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color and nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A little lightweight, but fine for meds and great for keeping them safe away from children.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Price is right, easy to use. Roomy enough to keep all of my meds in.

customer_reviews.title: No Little Fingers Tampering With My Prescription Medicines
customer_reviews.text: I just needed something small and that's exactly what it is. There's a few things, small items, that I need to lock away from prying fingers and it has succeeded already.
customer_reviews.author: Guardian Windowfrog

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and well thought out interior space
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and well thought out interior space. Lock seems fine, just enough to foil someone who should not have access to the medicine inside.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out great for me to keep my meds in and away from my grandsons

customer_reviews.title: Toddler safety purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for "toddler safety" when she is at her grandparent's house. The box is easily opened by our elderly family with a combo lock and is always secured, so our toddler can not reach the medications. Great product and purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Medicine chest
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for my husband to move the numbers to the correct code and the directions to set the code were written by someone who is learning English. Once you figure out how to set you code, you're golden.

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my good friend, who has medications she wants to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my good friend, who has medications she wants to make sure her small child won't get into... got the travel case too! She LOVES them both! Thank you for letting me help a good friend feel less anxious in her own home :)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: eoere Combination Lock Medicine Cabinet with Separate Compartments,Locking Prescription Pill Case,Child Proof Plastic Storage Box, Size 11 x 7.4 x 6.2 inches, Blue
feature_bullets: Tips: Press Slightly and Slide Downward the Combination , Note : This is the Plastic Box. With Combination lock that is easy to use and changeable; Safer with the meds locked up and keep away from children, kids proof.
Size 11" L x 7.4'' W x 6.2"H , Enough Space can hold approximately 20-24 prescription bottles.(mini bottles)
Compartment Design is nice for storing different sized Pills or Medication.（maximum bottle height of Vertical：5.1”）Upgrade-Quality ABS material,Very lightweight but Durable
Great for general storage of Medication and Household First Aid Kit , valuables and personal items; It can carry outdoor as a aid kit for family, business, or sports team
Note: please remember your passwords; please remember to lock the box after you use it as the latch is not designed to latch the box; do not use it as a steel safe for it is not a safety deposit box
